title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item on the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

OB: [Please supplement the observed behavior.] 

EB: The second time I attempt to select an item, it can be selected successfully.

SR: 
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
4. Notice that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
5. Repeat the selection attempt and observe that the item can be selected on subsequent attempts.
